description: This file is a Markdown documentation describing the 'Subsystems' concept in the Thunder framework, including how subsystems are managed, their metadata, interactions through plugin interfaces, and notification mechanisms. It is not executable source code but a structured reference document.

classes.name: InternetInfo
classes.description: A plugin implementation of the IInternet interface that provides metadata about the Internet subsystem, such as public IP address and network type.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: An implementation of ISubsystem::INotification that reacts to subsystem state changes, primarily for receiving notifications when any subsystem changes state.

methods.name: InternetInfo::PublicIPAddress
methods.description: Returns the current public IP address of the device as maintained by the plugin.

methods.name: InternetInfo::NetworkType
methods.description: Returns the network type (UNKNOWN, IPV4, IPV6) for the Internet subsystem.

methods.name: Notification::Updated
methods.description: Callback invoked when any subsystem's state has changed, allowing the plugin to react accordingly.
